title: Does riot know what does it mean by fair
body:
any of u guys ever team with a bull shit 2 times in a roll? especailly after u report that shit and fk already block him?

just experienced one and i cannot figure out how come a 34 win people team with a 1700 win one.


in addition, when u let people who feed to 0/3 blame me cause i was 1/2 under heavy ganks for feeding, what is the so called best sports man like game? u guys dunt feel shame that u r lairs? i reported all those bull shits and only once it noticed me some one is punished, so really i want fk ur guys cause in other posts they get at least apologize, and in all mine post the riot pp say nothing cause they r just discriminate me, so good on your shit, try delete this again.

and also dear fking leader of the board, answer my questions before delete all the things and disable discussions,  i asked how the fk the other team get diamond and plat rank while my team only gets bronze or silver most of the time? why no body answer? dunt tell me u guys choose to intentionally ignore some thing cause that will review ur incompetent.

and when u say not be a jerk, why dunt u delete fking those who say my english is bad? tell me when faker cannot speak english well, will the riot company ban him from the game? just ur fking aussie "gods" discriminate people hard but still cannot make it through the wild card selection to the world stage, so stfu when u say my english is bad, cause good english only led to worst games( delete this i will continue cause u never delete those who use their good english as a weapon to harm people)

and btw, I remeber aussie teams has asian guys, is that correct? ur white good people can confirm it and make sure they all get ielts band 9 to play for this country?

replies.body:
You might get more response with less hostility, just a thought.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=RNG Worlds S6,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=doAupPbO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-21T00:21:37.984+0000)
>
> [deleted]

Your English is just as bad if not worse. You are calling someone out on their English when you can't even use the correct punctuation. If you are going to belittle someone because of their language, then perhaps you should show an example as to not make a fool of ones self!

To dumb it down for you.

hurdur you didnt say the bestest england you selfie bro

Hey summoner,

You keep saying we don't answer your questions. So this time I'll try to be as specific as possible. Hopefully we can clear things up :D

__*


> in addition, when u let people who feed to 0/3 blame me cause i was 1/2 under heavy ganks for feeding, what is the so called best sports man like game?

+ **Riot** doesn't "let people" feed in your games. Just like everyone else, they have no way of knowing who is going to feed in a game. The best they can do is punish the player afterwards and stop them from feeding or being unsportsmanlike again.

 May I suggest that you find some friends to play with as a premade? It might make your in-game experience far more enjoyable.

__*

> and also dear fking leader of the board, answer my questions before delete all the things and disable discussions

+ Dear Raging Blade, please stop cussing and insulting others and we will be glad to answer your questions. 

 You're not doing to bad ATM actually. Keep up the good work!

__*

> how the fk the other team get diamond and plat rank while my team only gets bronze or silver most of the time?

+ In normals, the MMR variance between teams is greater. Especially if you queue up **2:00 am** (like you often do). Also since you're not the platinum player yourself, it's more likely that the platinum player will be on the other team.

 If you're looking for competitive matches with better matchmaking, I recommend you try playing ranked or try playing at different times during the day.

__*

> and when u say not be a jerk, why dunt u delete fking those who say my english is bad?

+ Good question. 

 Posts that are considered severely offensive will be deleted. In your case, your posts were deleted because you said multiple times _"go fk urselves"_ and _"go fk ur mom"_.

 When people insult your English they do not attach it to any racial insults or make it strongly offensive by cussing. However, you if see someone who has crossed the line, feel free to report it and I'll remove it for you.
pls do not lie to pp here i normally play between fking 8-1 in night, so do ur fking search ok? in normal times u just team me with bad people and dunt use something extreme as excuse

I'm not sure what time zone you're in, but many of your games with Gold and Platinum players (that I saw), were played between 12am and 2am (AEST) according to OP.GG. 

I'm simply listing it as probable cause as to why you might be encountering higher elo players as often as you say.

and also now fking u team me with a group of damed people that report me for afk while they feed since 30s, so after game they got no punishment while i am punished for "afk" your dear shits must enjoy discriminate me so hard,

or in other words if u play with friends u can frame others and your fking system do not even look in to cases! good system

I don't know why you keep blaming board moderators for matchmaking issues. I didn't match you against anyone! :D

Let me clarify; **I don't work for Riot in any way**. I have nothing to do with your matchmaking.

If you truly believe that your matchmaking is bugged then I recommend you send in a **Riot** support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Your name is appropriate.
With the attitude you display here, you're probably the one causing problems in the team most of the time.
You're that kid who abuses someone for dying once, then puts them into tilt by not letting it go.

As the saying goes, if you meet an asshole every now and then, they are an asshole. If you meet assholes all the time, you're the asshole.

in all the games i saw people toxic every game and fking only i get punished. so go eat shits i dun care about your rules and ya people just good at discrimination, and for each game you ruined mine i will ruin others 1 game to return the fking favor

for all these fking shit situation u put me in it is fine, so every game u let me wait i will simply make the game lose so fking ya "good" people can let people enjoy my feelings, when they feed i report and still get feeders, and after that what i get? enjoy doing so and i wont put any money in skins. and if i am punished for feeding i will simply sue u guys for discrimination and fk u guys off cause i am just having some bad games

the problems from all your answers never contain any apology, which is the best i can see from your attitude, may you guys in this place think yoursleves are god and never try to work out how to improve on the game, and rather blame players. so no wonder there are even less pp in china play this game now, enjoy your god like feelings

and when u team making is unfair, is it my problem or ur mother fkers problem? finding excuse to discriminate people is the first i can see  from all my experience, so u really dunt care about players feelings because this is the part as u said" team pp with roughly the same lv together"

To clarify on Tele's last point, I deleted any comments in that thread **I saw** that broke the rules before I disabled commenting. I disabled commenting because the discussion was not progressing, rather it was devolving into insults and antagonism. I may very well have missed a comment so I will go back and check the thread.

That said, the wrongdoing of others does not validate your own. Continue to break the rules and you will face more than warnings.
yeah so ur whit shits just protect ur own people under such excuse and go on with it

im very sure they do know! but do you? 

http://www.dictionary.com/browse/fair

btw, im also sure asian guys on aussie teams can definitely speak english well. 
if you were paid based on how good your english was, you'd be homeless
luckily for you the world isn't that un"fair"
Just realize that League Of Legends would never be a fair game.
Can we just ban this guy? He's doing nothing to benefit the community
